title: What's the best reason to major in secondary education? - Quora

response.answer_text: For the students, that is the only good reason really.  Don't do it for the glory or pay (ha!)...  do it because you love working with adolescents and helping them become educated and successful young men and women.  As a retired high school teacher, I've met many people who "fell into" teaching a high school subject because they loved the subject, but unless they also loved working with adolescents, they sucked and were miserable.  If you love science but don't love people, do research.
